remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间公开了对象表示的所有控件和用户界面 (UI) 元素支持的视觉样式。The namespace exposes objects that represent all of the controls and user interface (UI) elements that are supported by visual styles. 若要绘制或获取有关特定元素的信息，必须设置感兴趣的元素。To draw or get information about a particular element, you must set a to the element you are interested in. 一个是自动设置为指定中构造函数，但您还可以设置的现有给不同的元素通过调用方法。A is automatically set to a specified in the constructor, but you can also set an existing to a different element by calling the method. 若要绘制一个元素，请使用方法。To draw an element, use the method. 类还包括方法，如和，它们提供了有关如何将元素定义由当前视觉样式的信息。The class also includes methods, such as and , that provide information about how an element is defined by the current visual style. 构造函数和许多方法会引发异常，除非在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用于 windows 的应用程序的工作区。The constructor and many of the methods throw exceptions unless visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows. 若要检查这些条件，请使用`static`属性。To check for these conditions, use the `static` property. 类包装了视觉样式 (UxTheme) API 从 Windows Platform SDK 的 Windows Shell 部分的功能。The class wraps the functionality of the visual styles (UxTheme) API from the Windows Shell portion of the Windows Platform SDK. 视觉样式的详细信息，请参阅"使用 Windows XP 视觉样式"上的 MSDN Library 的 Platform SDK 部分中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)。For more information about visual styles, see "Using Windows XP Visual Styles" in the Platform SDK portion of the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类，以实现自定义控件，用于模拟某些窗口，其中包括使用标题栏拖动、 调整大小控点，使用重设大小和关闭的基本 UI。The following code example uses the class to implement a custom control that simulates some of the basic UI of a window, including dragging with the title bar, resizing with the sizing handle, and closing. 此示例中使用多个对象表示一个窗口，其中包括通过公开的元素的标准组成部分， ，和类。This example uses several objects that represent standard parts of a window, including the elements exposed by the , , and classes.
